ListPreference.android:title: Build Type
ListPreference.android:summary:
Tap to change the selected build type for all players

Here is a description of each:
- Default Random: Completely random builds
- Full Offensive: Only offensive items
- Full Defensive: Only defensive items
- Half-and-Half: Half offensive half defensive
- Off on off, def on def: Offensive items on offensive gods, defensive items on defensive gods

SwitchPreference.android:title: Are warriors offensive?
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Turn this on to consider warriors offensive to the generator
Forces each team member to have a different type god
